hero.title: Ministry of Fisheries and Marine Resources
hero.subtitle: Promoting sustainable development of Angola's marine resources

about.missionText: To promote sustainable development of fisheries and marine resources, ensuring food security and economic growth in Angola.
about.visionText: To be recognized as a ministry of excellence in marine resource management, contributing to the national blue economy.
about.valuesText: Sustainability, Transparency, Innovation, Social Inclusion and Environmental Responsibility.

footer.description: Ministry of Fisheries and Marine Resources of Angola - Promoting sustainable development of marine resources.
